Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Hospitals

Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on Hospitals
Oversight - ICE’s Escalated Attacks on NYC Policies Protecting Immigrants.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: ICE’s Escalated Attacks on NYC Policies Protecting Immigrants

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the United States Congress to pass, and the President to sign the Combating Deceptive Immigration Enforcement Practices Act of 2019 (H.R. 3498), prohibiting agents of the United States Department of Homeland Security from wearing clothing or equipment that bears the word “police,” and ..Titlecalling upon the Department of Homeland Security to prohibit United States Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE) agents from identifying themselves as police officers while conducting immigration enforcement activities in New York City.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Combating Deceptive Immigration Enforcement Practices Act of 2019 (H.R. 3498)

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Rivera and Cornegy

Items.Title: Oversight - ICE’s Escalated Attacks on NYC Policies Protecting Immigrants.
